alert.note: Alert for Northern Lake County; Orange; Southern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 7:42PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Lake and northwestern Orange Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 742 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sorrento, or over Mount Dora, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Apopka, Eustis, Tavares, Mount Dora, and Howey-In-the-hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lake County; Orange; Southern Lake County
